modName: Nightingale_Prentiss aka Agent Prentiss by Kronica
summary: This is a custom NPC mod created by Kronica. This new NPC will follow when asked and you can also store items and remove items from her inventory. This newly developed NPC is also up for marriage.
descriptionHtml:
Installation

Simply take the Nightingale_Prentiss.esp and place it in your Skyrim directory data folder. 
Make sure you check to see if the file is checked and activated in data files before launching the game. 

Uninstallation

Simply remove the Nightingale_Prentiss.esp file from your data folder.
